author: Zusha Elinson, Sadie Gurman
title: Prisoners Riot as Tensions Rise...
description: Prisoners Riot as Tensions Rise... (Top headline, 9th story, link ) Related stories: New York daily death toll reaches third-straight record at 799... Inside the Epicenter... Outbreak Aboard Second Navy Carrier... Virus traces found in wastewater at high leve…
content:
Coronavirus-fueled tensions inside the nations prisons and jails are boiling over into riots, standoffs and hunger strikes.
Officers at a Washington state penitentiary fired nonlethal rounds and used pepper spray to break up a demonstration of more than 100 … [+91 chars]
